data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The name fits the DateTime project naming scheme. It was discussed
    on the DateTime list and Builder was found to be the most pleasing
    and appropriate.

    The purpose of Builder is to simplify the creation of
    DateTime::Format modules. At present this means it helps one create
    format parsers in a fairly straight forward manner.

    As one of the more useful, yet independent, components of the
    DateTime project it makes sense to have it on the module list.

    cheers,
